email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MT Oceanic, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The MT Oceanic sounds like a good fit, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. The laycan for the MT Oceanic is currently set for October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Also, the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. The laycan dates are acceptable, but could we push the demurrage rate down to $18,000 per day? We’re trying to keep costs as low as possible. Let me know if that’s feasible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed your request with the owners, and we can agree to a demurrage rate of $18,500 per day. This is the best we can do at the moment. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds fair. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $50.75 per metric ton and a demurrage rate of $18,500 per day. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that we’re aligned. I’ll have the contract drafted and sent over to you by end of day. The laycan remains October 15-20, and the vessel will be ready for loading in Houston. Thanks for your business, and let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
